A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A great movie in itself\, just disappointed on the emphasis between a forbidden bond between the main protag and genocidal antag over exploring Kylo Ren and Finn as darkside foils. So much sexual subtext and symbolism left a puzzling moral conundrum. They tried to force a reverse Anakin/Padme too much\, when Kylo is too far into evil for condonable redemption and deep connection.
